We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share information when you use our Android app.
Information We Collect:
Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other contact information when you create an account or contact us. Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use our app, such as your search queries and the recipes you view and save. How We Use Your Information:
We use your personal information to provide you with our services, to respond to your inquiries, and to communicate with you about our app and services. We use your usage information to improve our app and services, to personalize your experience, and to provide you with relevant content. How We Share Your Information:
We do not share your personal information with third parties, except as required by law or with your consent. We may share your usage information with third-party analytics providers to help us analyze how our app is being used and to improve our services. Data Security: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, and disclosure. However, please note that no transmission over the internet or electronic storage method is 100% secure.
Changes to Privacy Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will provide notice of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website or within our app.

Introducing our team of Dishcovery app developers, a group of highly skilled and passionate individuals dedicated to creating the ultimate culinary experience for our users.
With years of experience in Android development and a deep love for food and cooking, our team brings a unique blend of technical expertise and creative flair to the table. We are committed to designing intuitive and user-friendly interfaces that allow our users to effortlessly discover new recipes, save their favorites, and share their own creations with the world.
Our team\'s innovative spirit and attention to detail are reflected in every aspect of Dishcovery, from the sleek and modern design to the robust and reliable backend infrastructure. We take pride in delivering a seamless and enjoyable cooking experience that helps our users improve their culinary skills and explore new flavors and cuisines.
Whether you are a beginner or a seasoned chef, Dishcovery has something for everyone. Join us on this exciting journey and discover the joy of cooking with our app.
